sentence.text: To further explore this, we investigated the associations of peripheral transcription, DNA-templated-1<sub>F</sub> methylation (52 CpGs) with the cortisol stress response (Trier Social Stress Test) and with childhood trauma in three independent studies (total N = 241) including healthy controls, patients with schizophrenia and bipolar disorder and unaffected siblings of patients with one of these disorders.
